bibl.title: The Titles of the Gospels in the Earliest New Testament Manuscripts.
bibl.note: Prolegomena. - The Nestle-Aland Titles. - Aim. - Presentation. - 1. The Greek Manuscript Evidence. - 2. The Evidence of Latin Manuscripts. - 3. The Evidence of Syriac Manuscripts. - 4. The Evidence of Coptic Manuscripts. - 5. The Titles in the Earliest Manuscripts and in NA27. - 6. Conclusion.
